pageContext.claim: “The wind is very expensive because you put up those windmills -- I know it very well. First of all, they're made in Germany and they're made in China.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is wrong when he suggests China and Germany are manufacturing all wind turbines. In 2018, the top manufacturer was Vestas, based in Denmark, according to bizvibe.com; it has manufacturing facilities North and Latin America, Europe and Asia. General Electric, based in United States, is in fourth place.
